name: VAST (itch) (Vast-game)
description:
Grow procedural buildings in a vast desert landscape!

Vast is an exploration game set in a vast barren world. It allows the player to get creative by placing procedurally growing structures to sculpt the world without limitations. There are endless possibilities to travel and shape the world.

The game can be played with mouse and keyboard or controler. A short tutorial will help you at the beginning.

note: dont switch input device at runtime.
